title: vaiyagamellAm
sahitya:
vaiyagamellAm ayya nin aruLinAl vAzhga oru kulamAi


anupallavi

  tuyya mana sAkSi shol vazhi sel vIrat-toNDarAi anbuLLa tOzharAi nALumE


caraNam    jAti mada nira bhEdamillAmalE sari nigharAna Anma urimaiyil OngiyE
jyOti aruLveLiyil sUriyak-kadirgaL pOl shuddhAnanda sutantara nittiya shIlarAi
